eelaga hathalis wasara thula thel walin lada aadayamin lowa athishayen dilidu ratawal atharin ekak wu wenisiyulawata lathin amarikawa thula dhanawathma ratawal atharin ekak wimata haki wiya.wenisiyulawe dala jathika aadayama ihala thathwayaka pawathi athara saukhaya, adhayapanika,samajiya mattamin ihala wardhanayak athi wiya.me athara thura opek sanwidhanaya ayath ratawalata 1973 warshayedi thel sambadhaka hethu karagena pettroliyam mila ahasa usata siw gunayakin wadi wiya.me kalaya wana wita aarthika kuli ghathakayan thama kriyadamayan mal pala ganwa ganimata hoda wathawaranayak uda wimath samaga ohun wenisiyulawe banku yatithala wiyuhayan sadahath,karmika wayapruthi ha mahadwipaya thula usama godanagilla idikirime katayuthu sadahath 1980 di naya aadhara laba dena ladi.melesin wenisiyulawe madhayama panthiya salakiya yuthu mattamaka wardhanaya wu athara athi wishala parasayakata ayath nishpadana sadaha weladapolak nirmanaya wuha.enamuth rasakawili sappu ha karmantha shala walata shramaya sapayana dilidu jana kottasayakda wiya.
